dublinCore.dc:title: 114 HR 1480 RH: SAFE Act Confidentiality and Privilege Enhancement Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Dold (for himself and Mr. Perlmutter) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Financial Services
Additional sponsors: Mr. Neugebauer, Mr. Huizenga of Michigan, and Mr. Sessions
Committed to the Committee of the Whole House on the State of the Union and ordered to be printed

form.official-title: To ensure access to certain information for financial services industry regulators, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the SAFE Act Confidentiality and Privilege Enhancement Act.

section.header: Confidentiality of information shared between State and Federal financial services regulators
section.text: Section 1512(a) of the S.A.F.E. Mortgage Licensing Act of 2008 (12 U.S.C. 5111(a)) is amended by inserting or financial services before industry.

endorsement.action-desc: Committed to the Committee of the Whole House on the State of the Union and ordered to be printed
